title: # 274 - Ron Funches & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with Ron Funches to talk about Ron growing up in Oregon, Halston and Rons connection to their home town, having a son with autism, and Rons best day ever. 

Check out my new friend and "shoe guy" on instagram @angelo_Blano and order some new shoes from him! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. My listeners get a trial month of everything you need to keep your hair – for just $5. Just go to www.forhims.com/bertcasted
